title: Can someone explain to me how to beat darius in lane?
body:
This guy walks up and Qs and gets to zone me off his creeps before he even has a kill on me because if I get pulled in there's no way I'm takin' a favorable trade. Meanwhile, his Q is not only good for harass, but gives him a heal, and he can cripple you so you can't even walk away from the Q before it goes off. Oh yeah and he can always bleed you out, and in general attempting to 1v1 him seems like a completely impossible feat, especially when he's level 6 and can just ult your head for an execute. Jungler can't even help you because he can just 2v1.

I can't even fucking FARM vs a darius because he can just pull me in, how am I supposed to kill him??? He just completely ruins top lane for me -__-
